metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33733 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - high.
metadata.Description:
Reportlab up to v3.6.12 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via supplying a crafted PDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-33733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-renderpm - 3.6.11-1ubuntu0.1
python3-reportlab - 3.6.11-1ubuntu0.1
python3-reportlab-accel - 3.6.11-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> PoC in the github writeup

criterions.comment: python-reportlab package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.11-1ubuntu0.1').
